# iterative

**Instance Property**

An effect that momentarily enables each layer of a symbol-based image in sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
var iterative: VariableColorSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Discussion

This effect enables each successive variable layer for a short period of time, and then disables the layer until the animation cycle ends. This effect cancels the [doc://com.apple.symbols/documentation/Symbols/VariableColorSymbolEffect/cumulative] variant.

## Controlling fill style

- **cumulative**: An effect that enables each layer of a symbol-based image in sequence.
